trans-unit.source: Error Throw Exception: If an error occurs throw HttpClientException.
Error Log: If an error occurs log is written to file typo3temp/logs/typo3.log.
Client Connection Timeout: Max seconds allowed to connect to the server.
Client Timeout: Max seconds allowed to individual calls.
Client Proxy Typo3: Use the system HTTP proxy (TYPO3_CONF_VARS[HTTP][proxy_*]).
Client Proxy Address: The proxy address to send the requests.
Client Proxy Port: The proxy port to use.
Client Proxy Credentials: The proxy credentials to use.
Client Proxy Auth Scheme: Authentication method.
Client Follow Redirect: Client follow redirect.
Client Max Redirect: Client maximum number of redirect.
Client Check Http Code: Client verify the response http status code (failure if greater or equal than 400).
Client User Agent: Use any User Agent you choose.
